title: *****PARTY BONUS MEGATHREAD*****
body:
A few hours ago Riot announced that they will be awarding IP bonuses to people who queue together.
But Riot... I don't have any friends...
It doesn't matter!
Join the "Looking For Group" public chatroom. There are always a lot of people in there.

Post your name and rank (or unplaced) in this thread and ill add it to the list!


rccnst  Gold
Zozuh Gold
UBloodyRippah Unplaced
Mickee Unplaced
Traloop Bronze
Tribalmind Silver

replies.body: I got a party boner once. She didn't call after that.
Well why not.  Tribalmind Silver rank
Why does rank matter if your just playing for the ip
You can only queue with people within a tier of your own rank

> [{quoted}](name=rccnst,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=ihcpVOkj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-21T12:02:55.066+0000)
>
> You can only queue with people within a tier of your own rank

Why not just play norms?
You get more bonus when you play ranked (I could be wrong about this)

> [{quoted}](name=rccnst,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=ihcpVOkj,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T22:35:05.145+0000)
>
> You get more bonus when you play ranked (I could be wrong about this)

You're right.
YFW nobody cares about your megathread
